com.example.painintheass.GameLogic.Units

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.painintheass.GameLogic.Units.Unit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Archer, Castle, Knight, Mage

    public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a basic Unit. Extended by Archer, Mage and Knight.
